campfire-in-georgia.name: Campfire in Georgia
campfire-in-georgia.ingredients: Mezcal | Peach Habanero Puree | Orange Juice | Bitters | Smoked
campfire-in-georgia.full:
2 oz Del Maguey Vida Mezcal
0.5 oz Campfire Shrub (Peach & Habanero Puree)
0.5 oz Orange Juice
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
campfire-in-georgia.clean:
Del Maguey Vida Mezcal
Campfire Shrub (Peach & Habanero Puree)
Orange Juice
Angostura Bitters
campfire-in-georgia.instructions:
Shake with ice and strain into a double rocks glass filled with one large ice cube.
Set the cocktail on a small heatproof serving platter and place the Cinnamon French Oak alongside the glass.
Light the oak with a butane torch.

Campfire Shrub:
5 pounds fresh peaches, pitted and coarsely chopped (if peaches are not in season, you can use frozen)
8 cups granulated white sugar
5 1/4 cups apple cider vinegar
2 habanero peppers, chopped 
12 cinnamon sticks

Add the peaches, sugar,4 cups of the vinegar, the peppers and the cinnamon sticks to a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir occasionally until all the sugar has dissolved.
Lower the heat and let simmer for 1 hour. Remove from the heat and let cool. Use a fine mesh strainer to remove and discard the solids. Add the remaining 1 1/4 cups of vinegar and stir.
Pour into a bottle, and store at room temperature until needed.

the-canon.name: The Canon
the-canon.ingredients: Rye | Amaro | Angostura | Orange Lemon Foam
the-canon.full:
2 oz Old Overholt Rye Whiskey
1 oz Sweet Vermouth
0.5 oz Amaro Ramazzotti
4 drops Angostura Bitters
Float Canon Foam
the-canon.clean:
Old Overholt Rye Whiskey
Sweet Vermouth
Amaro Ramazzotti
Angostura Bitters
Canon Foam
the-canon.instructions:
Stir with ice and strain into a double rocks glass filled with one large ice cube.
Top with Canon Foam. Drop Bitters, or use a spray bottle to apply.

Canon Foam:
2 sheets bloomed gelatin 3 ounces hot water
6 ounces Combier triple sec
3 ounces fresh lemon juice
3 large egg whites

Place the bloomed gelatin in the hot water in an iSi Easy Whip canister and stir until the gelatin has melted. Let sit for a couple of minutes, then stir in the triple sec, lemon juice, and egg whites.
Charge with 2 N2O chargers and refrigerate until needed.

london-fog.name: London Fog
london-fog.ingredients: Amaro | Gin | Lemon | Earl Grey Syrup | Egg
london-fog.full:
1 oz Amaro Nonino
0.75 oz Citadelle Gin
0.75 oz Lemon Juice
0.75 oz Earl Grey Syrup
0.25 oz Italicus
0.25 oz Benedictine
0.5 oz Egg White
london-fog.clean:
Amaro Nonino
Citadelle Gin
Lemon Juice
Earl Grey Syrup
Italicus
Benedictine
Egg White
london-fog.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Earl Grey Syrup:
4 oz water
1 Earl Grey Tea Bag

Heat 4 oz of water to a simmer, add the tea bag and steep for 8 minutes. Remove the tea bag, squeeze tea bag, and strain liquid into pot. Add equal sugar by weight for a 1:1 ratio, stirring until dissolved.
Let cool before using.

redzone-flip.name: Redzone Flip
redzone-flip.ingredients: Bourbon | Raspberry | Whole Egg | Peach Bitters
redzone-flip.full:
1.5 oz Bulleit Bourbon Whiskey
1 oz Raspberry Syrup
0.5 oz Pallini Raspberry Liqueur
2 dashes Peach Bitters
1 Whole Egg
redzone-flip.clean:
Bulleit Bourbon Whiskey
Raspberry Syrup
Pallini Raspberry Liqueur
Peach Bitters
Whole Egg
redzone-flip.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with 3 fresh skewered raspberries.

knuckles-milk-punch.name: Knuckles Milk Punch
knuckles-milk-punch.ingredients: Bourbon | Cacao | Cream | Cognac | Honey | Nutmeg
knuckles-milk-punch.full:
2 oz Breakfast Cream
1 oz Eastern Kille Cognac Finished Bourbon
1 oz Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac
0.25 oz Honey Syrup
Grated Nutmeg
knuckles-milk-punch.clean:
Breakfast Cream
Eastern Kille Cognac Finished Bourbon
Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac
Honey Syrup
Nutmeg
knuckles-milk-punch.instructions:
Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice cubes. Grate Nutmeg on top.

Breakfast Cream:
14 ounces heavy cream
¼ cup Tempus Fugit crème de
cacao
2 tablespoons vanilla extract

Add the cream, crème de cacao, and vanilla extract to a squeeze bottle.
Shake vigorously for at least 3 minutes. Alternatively, you can use an immersion blender, being careful not to whip too long.
The mixture should be the consistency of heavy wet cream that can float on liquids. Do not let the cream stiffen too much.

late-night-in-oaxaca.name: Late Night in Oaxaca
late-night-in-oaxaca.ingredients: Mezcal | Tequila | Coffee Liqueur | Sugar | Bitters
late-night-in-oaxaca.full:
1.5 oz Vida Del Maguey Mezcal
0.5 oz Adictivo Reposado Tequila
0.5 oz Mr. Black Coffee Liqueur
0.25 oz Simple Syrup
2 dashes Orange Bitters
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
late-night-in-oaxaca.clean:
Vida Del Maguey Mezcal
Adictivo Reposado Tequila
Mr. Black Coffee Liqueur
Simple Syrup
Orange Bitters
Angostura Bitters
late-night-in-oaxaca.instructions:
Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a rocks glass with one large ice cube.
Optionally garnish with an orange twist.

wedding-old-fashioned.name: Wedding Old Fashioned
wedding-old-fashioned.full:
2 oz Elijah Craig Bourbon
0.66 oz Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
4 Dashes Chocolate Bitters
wedding-old-fashioned.clean:
Elijah Craig Bourbon
Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
Chocolate Bitters
wedding-old-fashioned.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with banana chip.

midnight-banana-flip.name: Midnight Banana Flip
midnight-banana-flip.ingredients: Rum | Banana | Cacao | Demerara Syrup | Whole Egg | Nutmeg
midnight-banana-flip.full:
1.5 oz Appleton Estate Jamaican Rum
0.75 oz Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
0.5 oz Tempus Fugit Dark Creme de Cacao
1 tsp Demerara Syrup
1 Whole Egg
Grated Nutmeg
midnight-banana-flip.clean:
Appleton Estate Jamaican Rum
Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
Tempus Fugit Dark Creme de Cacao
Demerara Syrup
Whole Egg
Nutmeg
midnight-banana-flip.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Grate Nutmeg on top.

banana-stand.name: Banana Stand
banana-stand.ingredients: Rye | Banana | Cognac | Honey | Bitters | Smoked
banana-stand.full:
1 oz Rittenhouse Rye Whiskey
1 oz Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac
1 oz Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
0.75 oz Honey Syrup
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
banana-stand.clean:
Rittenhouse Rye Whiskey
Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac
Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
Honey Syrup
Angostura Bitters
banana-stand.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a Bordeaux glass filled with a single large ice cube. Smoke with oak chips.

bananarac.name: Bananarac
bananarac.ingredients: Absinthee | Banana | Cognac | Rye | Demerara Syrup | Bitters
bananarac.full:
Rinse/Spritz Long Road Distillery Absinthe
1 oz Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac
1 oz Old Overholt Rye Whiskey
0.5 oz Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
1 tsp Demerara Syrup
1 Dash Peychaud's Bitters
bananarac.clean:
Long Road Distillery Absinthe
Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac
Old Overholt Rye Whiskey
Giffard Banane du Bresil Banana Liqueur
Demerara Syrup
Peychaud's Bitters
bananarac.instructions:
Rinse a chilled rocks glass with Absinthee, or alternatively use an atomizer to spray 2 spritzes of Absinthe. Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into the rocks glass with no ice.
Optionally express a Lemon peel over the drink, use as garnish.

ashleys-ideal-daiquiri.name: Ashley's Ideal Daiquiri
ashleys-ideal-daiquiri.full:
1.5 oz Plataray 3 Star Dark Rum
1.25 oz Raspberry Syrup
1 oz Lime Juice
ashleys-ideal-daiquiri.clean:
Plataray 3 Star Dark Rum
Raspberry Syrup
Lime Juice
ashleys-ideal-daiquiri.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with 1 Raspberry

the-rumantic.name: The RUMantic
the-rumantic.ingredients: Rum | Pineapple | Velvet Falernum | Lime | Simple | Bitters
the-rumantic.full:
1 oz Plantaray 3 Star Light Rum
1 oz Plantaray Pineapple Rum
1 oz Lime Juice
0.5 oz Velvet Falernum
0.5 oz Simple Syrup
10 Dashes Angostura Bitters
10 Dashes Dark Overproof Rum, eg. Dr Bird
the-rumantic.clean:
Plantaray 3 Star Light Rum
Plantaray Pineapple Rum
Lime Juice
Velvet Falernum
Simple Syrup
Angostura Bitters
Dark Overproof Rum
the-rumantic.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a coupe.

good-4-u.name: Good 4 U
good-4-u.full:
1.5 oz Woodford Reserve Bourbon
1 oz Disaronno Amaretto
1 oz Lemon Juice
0.5 oz Egg White
good-4-u.clean:
Woodford Reserve Bourbon
Disaronno Amaretto
Lemon Juice
Egg White
good-4-u.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass with one large ice cube.
Top with a Lemon twist around a cherry on a skewer.

pink-pony-club.name: Pink Pony Club
pink-pony-club.full:
1.5 oz Aviation Gin
0.5 oz Raspberry Syrup
0.5 oz Lemon Juice
0.5 oz Egg White
pink-pony-club.clean:
Aviation Gin
Raspberry Syrup
Lemon Juice
Egg White
pink-pony-club.instructions:
Also known as a Clover Club.

Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a coupe or martini glass.
Garnish with 2 fresh skewered raspberries.

amelia.name: Amelia
amelia.full:
1.5 oz Smirnoff Vodka
1 oz St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur
0.75 oz Blackberry Puree
0.75 oz Lemon Juice
amelia.clean:
Smirnoff Vodka
St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur
Blackberry Puree
Lemon Juice
amelia.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Optionally garnish with a Mint sprig.

amaretto-sour.name: Amaretto Sour
amaretto-sour.full:
1.5 oz Disaronno Amaretto
1 oz Woodford Reserve Bourbon
1 oz Lemon Juice
0.5 oz Egg White
amaretto-sour.clean:
Disaronno Amaretto
Woodford Reserve Bourbon
Lemon Juice
Egg White
amaretto-sour.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a chilled rocks glass with one large ice cube.
Garnish with a Lemon peel and a cherry.

corpse-reviver-2.name: Corpse Reviver #2
corpse-reviver-2.ingredients: Gin | Lillet Blanc | Cointreau | Lemon | Absinthee
corpse-reviver-2.full:
0.75 oz New Holland Gin
0.75 oz Lillet Blanc
0.75 oz Cointreau
0.75 oz Lemon Juice
1 Dash Absinthee
corpse-reviver-2.clean:
New Holland Gin
Lillet Blanc
Cointreau
Lemon Juice
Absinthee
corpse-reviver-2.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Optionally garnish with a lemon twist.

corn-and-oil.name: Corn and Oil
corn-and-oil.full:
2 oz Doorlys 12 year Rum
0.5 oz Falernum
0.33 oz Lime Juice
4 Dashes Angostura Bitters
corn-and-oil.clean:
Doorlys 12 year Rum
Falernum
Lime Juice
Angostura Bitters
corn-and-oil.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Optionally garnish with a lime wheel.

final-ward.name: Final Ward
final-ward.full:
0.75 oz Rittenhouse Rye Whiskey
0.75 oz Green Chartreuse
0.75 oz Maraschino Liqueur
0.75 oz Lemon Juice
final-ward.clean:
Rittenhouse Rye Whiskey
Green Chartreuse
Maraschino Liqueur
Lemon Juice
final-ward.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

painkiller.name: Painkiller
painkiller.ingredients: Rum | Pineapple | Orange | Coconut | Lime | Nutmeg
painkiller.full:
1.5 oz Plantaray O.F.T.D Overproof Rum
0.5 oz Smith & Cross Jamaican Rum
4 oz Pineapple Juice
0.75 oz Orange Juice
1 oz Coconut Cream
0.25 oz Lime Juice
painkiller.clean:
Plataray O.F.T.D Overproof Rum
Smith & Cross Jamaican Rum
Pineapple Juice
Orange Juice
Coconut Cream
Lime Juice
painkiller.instructions:
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg. Optionally add an orange wedge or pineapple frond.
